title: ActionView::Template::Error (undefined method `order_clause' for #<ActiveAdmin::Page:0x0000000971c650>):
body:
My Rails app has been working great with ActiveAdmin..but now i am facing an issue ..which seems very hard to resolve.

The only reason i can see is my Gemfile.
`gem 'activeadmin', github: 'activeadmin'`

which always points to master,when i took a look at the previous working app..it had version of `1.0.0.pre2` and now it has `pre5`.Should i use a version number or Is there a fix for this issue.?

any help will be appreciated

```

this is my view file ..`dashboard.rb.`.snippet of the code inside tab block

 ```
table_for @request_edits, sortable: true do
                  column :email do |edit|
                    edit.hall_request.user.email

                  ##it fails here..this is line 81..
